SiegeEngineType.name: {=pa3E7810}Siege Preparations
SiegeEngineType.description: {=xBygO7kH}Fill in ditches, level the terrain and set up aracher positions in preparation of the assault.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=G0AWk1rX}Ladder
SiegeEngineType.description: {=9dKklwiv}Ladders are simple and quick to produce but offer no protection for the assailants.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=xaHELVnx}Siege Tower
SiegeEngineType.description: {=jWjnpW52}Siege towers allow approaching the walls without being exposed to missiles, and reduce the defender's height advantage.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=6UPgDokE}Advanced Siege Tower
SiegeEngineType.description: {=hhHcHGrO}A Siege tower that is sturdier and has a platform for archers.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=abbALYlp}Ballista
SiegeEngineType.description: {=atA20r4C}Ballistas are effective against enemy ranged weapons. They can also pick up individual enemies at range.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=NeWvHjCw}Fire Ballista
SiegeEngineType.description: {=4lS8cX6c}Fire ballistas are similar to regular ballistas but fire burning projectiles which are more effective against siege engines.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=Ew11a1Tx}Catapult
SiegeEngineType.description: {=1bbdz9iS}Catapults are effective against enemy siege engines as well as walls.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=Wg2P3acK}Fire Catapult
SiegeEngineType.description: {=nM3ENTEW}Fire catapults are similar to regular ones but fire incendiary projectiles which are more effective against siege engines

SiegeEngineType.name: {=GPESFoWD}Onager
SiegeEngineType.description: {=CbnswkEa}Onagers are effective against enemy siege engines as well as walls.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=iLD5Lkto}Fire Onager
SiegeEngineType.description: {=S6odGUh9}Fire Onagers are effective against enemy siege engines as well as walls and hurl incendiary projectiles.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=TlP31w8l}Bricole
SiegeEngineType.description: {=0bPqoNk9}Bricoles are powerful siege weapons that can be placed on towers.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=4Skg9QhO}Trebuchet
SiegeEngineType.description: {=UP0EKlfK}Trebuchets take time to build and set up but given enough time, will turn enemy defenses to rubble.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=lFl5Ai1a}Fire Trebuchet
SiegeEngineType.description: {=uvUHbHoW}Fire trebuchets hurl incendiary projectiles instead of regular stones which are more effective against enemy siege weapons and personell.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=MaBSSg7I}Battering Ram
SiegeEngineType.description: {=U9MJaX7f}A battering ram can be used to break the gate and open access to the inner courtyard.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=zt0bVSsU}Improved Ram
SiegeEngineType.description: {=8VUZPA6Q}A more powerful version of the regular battering ram.
